Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using mouse dopamine-deprived medium derived from N201 Kun什N201 (dopaminergic neurons).

Readout description.Result Description: Parkin C289G mutant exhibited 50% reduction in LC3 immunoprecipitation and mitochondrial LC3 accumulation compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Two biological replicates were performed with ±10% variability between them.

Technical replicates.Description: Each condition was tested in triplicate to ensure reproducibility.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type Parkin immunoprecipitation was used as a positive control.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: LC3 immunoprecipitation and mitochondrial LC3 accumulation levels above 150% of the wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: LC3 immunoprecipitation and mitochondrial LC3 accumulation levels below 60% of the wild-type.
Threshold for abnormal readout.Source: Custom determination based on observed variability.
